pairs.response:
Response
You can roll a blunt with a variety of wraps, with the most common being hollowed-out cigars or tobacco-free hemp wraps

. Your choice depends on personal preference regarding flavor, burn speed, and whether you want to avoid nicotine.

Blunt wraps

Cigarillos: Traditionally, blunts are made by hollowing out inexpensive cigars or cigarillos and refilling them with cannabis. Popular brands include Swisher Sweets, Dutch Masters, and Phillies. These contain tobacco, which adds nicotine to the experience and provides a slower, longer burn.
Hemp wraps: A popular alternative to tobacco-based cigar wraps, hemp wraps are tobacco-free and often favored by those who want to avoid nicotine. They are widely available at dispensaries and head shops.
